Item ID23410

The Wolf cloak is a rare reward from medium Treasure Trails. It gives no stats and is purely cosmetic. It can be purchased by free-to-play players from other players or the Grand Exchange.

The '''Wolf cloak''' is a rare reward from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It gives no stats and is purely cosmetic. It can be purchased by [[free-to-play]] players from other players or the Grand Exchange.
